bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S. and Bruce W. FRIER, The Demography of Roman Egypt. (Cambridge Studies in Population, Economy and Society in Past Time. 23.)
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 1994, 8°, xix-354 pp., tabl., figg. ISBN 0-521-46123-5. £35/$49.95.

1. The census returns. - 2. The census returns as demographic evidence. - 3. Households. - 4. Female life expectancy. - 5. Male life expectancy and the sex ratio. - 6. Marriage. - 7. Fertility. - 8.
